entity.name: class_of_composition_of_product
entity.description:
A class_of_composition_of_product is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship and class that is a
Class of composition of product (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a class_of_product that has members in the role of whole.

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a class_of_product that has members in the role of part.
